Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class Mewdeko

The main class for Mewdeko, responsible for initializing services, handling events, and managing the bot's lifecycle.

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

Mewdeko(int)

Initializes a new instance of the Mewdeko bot with a specific shard ID.

Declaration
public Mewdeko(int shardId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int shardId

The ID of the shard this instance will operate on. If set to nothing it will act as if its unsharded.
Exceptions
Type Condition
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if the shard ID is negative.
